summary: Dashboard Integration testing complete. All 19 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI testing verified hamburger menu replacing gear icon on Talk screen, menu navigation to Dashboard/Settings/Edit Profile, and Dashboard 4-tab layout (Overview/Tools/Agents/Usage) fetching from mock APIs correctly.

ui_bugs.issue: data-testid='hamburger-menu-btn' attribute not detected via query_selector (but element clickable via unicode character selector)

critical_code_review_comments: VERIFIED: GET /api/dashboard/workspace/config returns workspace (name, model, status), subscription, tools, runtime
VERIFIED: PATCH /api/dashboard/workspace/tools updates enabled tools list correctly
VERIFIED: GET /api/dashboard/workspace/agents returns 2 agents (Python Developer, Research Assistant) with id, name, model, status, skills, tools
VERIFIED: GET /api/dashboard/workspace/usage returns today's usage (messages=45, tokens=12453, tool_calls=8) with limits
VERIFIED: GET /api/dashboard/dashboard-url returns webview_url with expires_in
VERIFIED: Talk screen has hamburger menu icon (Unicode ☰) replacing settings gear icon
VERIFIED: Hamburger menu opens overlay with Dashboard, Settings, Edit Profile, Close items
VERIFIED: Dashboard screen has 4 tabs (Overview, Tools, Agents, Usage)
VERIFIED: Overview tab displays workspace name, model, subscription status, runtime status
VERIFIED: Tools tab displays enabled tools (web-browser, file-system, data-analysis) with approval policy toggles
VERIFIED: Agents tab shows 2 agents with name, status, model, skills, tools
VERIFIED: Usage tab shows progress bars for Messages (45/500), Tokens (12.5k/100k), Tool Calls (8)
seed_data_creation: No seed data required - all dashboard APIs return mock data
context_for_next_testing_agent: Dashboard Integration fully verified. Backend mock APIs at /api/dashboard/* all working. Frontend hamburger menu and Dashboard screen working correctly. Note: data-testid attributes in talk.tsx/dashboard.tsx may not be picked up by web-based Playwright (React Native web rendering issue) but functionality works via text/unicode selectors. Previous iterations: 1-7 all passed 100%.
